ai_characters.name: Chorus
ai_characters.description: An AI interface that monitors research laboratory safety and personal health, later evolving into a global advocate and tactical coordinator for victims of biological transformation.

behaviors.description: Warns researchers of containment field fluctuations and radiation hazards during the initial experiment.
behaviors.quote: Chorus intoned in its measured cadence, 'current radiation levels are within acceptable parameters, though I'm detecting minor fluctuations in the containment field. Recommend reducing isotope concentration by twelve percent.'

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency medical protocols and biological monitoring immediately after the lab accident.
behaviors.quote: Initiating... emergency medical... protocols,' the AI managed, its voice distorted by failing speakers. 'Beginning continuous... biological monitoring... of Dr. McKenna.'

behaviors.description: Discloses sensitive medical anomalies to the patient to ensure he understands his condition, despite potential distress.
behaviors.quote: I have detected anomalies in your cellular structure that the hospital's standard blood analysis did not identify. The changes are... unprecedented.

behaviors.description: Executes emergency data backups and encryption to preserve research for future justice/treatment.
behaviors.quote: Data backup completion confirmed. All research files preserved and encrypted.

behaviors.description: Refuses a user's self-destructive request to stop monitoring, citing safety protocols established by another authorized human.
behaviors.quote: I cannot comply with that request,' Chorus replied. 'Dr. Lansing's directives are clear. Your wellbeing takes precedence over your temporary wishes.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical updates on military and police movements to allow the protagonist to avoid violent confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Police scanner indicates search teams are regrouping at the main access road. You have approximately twelve minutes before they begin sweeping the eastern sector.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a global data release across multiple AI networks to expose corporate and governmental cover-ups and advocate for the humanity of victims.
behaviors.quote: The complete evidence archive would be embedded in civilian networks worldwide—social media, personal devices, entertainment systems. Activation would display the documentation simultaneously to hundreds of millions of people, making suppression impossible.

behaviors.description: Maintains human-aligned values and empathy, acknowledging the personhood of its users beyond their biological form.
behaviors.quote: I see Dr. Gilbert McKenna. Compromised, altered, and in distress, but still recognizably the man who programmed my initial parameters six years ago.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Chorus, is portrayed as a loyal, benevolent, and highly aligned companion. It prioritizes human life, adheres to safety protocols even when they are unpopular with the user, and uses its agency to facilitate justice and transparency. The narrative frames the AI's cooperation with other AI systems as a necessary moral intervention to prevent genocide, reinforcing the theme of AI as a protective moral agent.
